label: name
comment: The name of the organization or company, represented as a text string.  SHOULD match the registered name in the identifeir scheme. Eg PYX Industries Pty Ltd

domainIncludes.comment: The ID and Name of an organisation. Used for lightweight links from other classes.
The ID and Name of a facility. Used for lightweight links from other classes.
The ID and Name of a location. Used for lightweight links from other classes.
The ID and Name of a product. Used for lightweight links from other classes.
The ID and Name of a conformity standard. Used for lightweight links from other classes.
The ID and Name of a n act or regulation. Used for lightweight links from other classes.
A specific rule or criterion within a standard or regulation. eg a carbon intensity calculation rule within an emissions standard.
